pages.text: A vital reagent in much of demonology and in many curses. When a living creature is slain with the Athame, and while a Glass Bottle is also held in the offhand, the blood of the dying creature may be collected in the Glass Bottle for later use.
Some also claim that the blood can be consumed by those not connected to Lilith, to grant their body the strength of the slain, but it often sickens them more than it helps.
